text: Lambert “Bertie” Croux (6 March 1927 — 8 July 2020Rouwbrief Lambert Croux , reweghs.be) was a Belgian politician. He was born in Bilzen, Belgium. He was a member of the CVP party. He was a senator from 1977 to 1981 and Member of the European Parliament from 1979 to 1989. Croux died on 8 July 2020 in Hasselt, Belgium at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Christelijke Volkspartij politicians Category:Flemish politicians Category:MEPs for Belgium Category:People from Limburg (Belgium)
title: Lambert Croux
